summary: Medicaid spent $87 billion in FY2015 for long term care services provided in homes and community settings. To receive these services, individuals’ needs must first be assessed—by a government agency, independent contractor, care provider, or others. title: Medicaid: CMS Should Take Additional Steps to Improve Assessments of Individuals' Needs for Home- and Community-Based Services
